Psionic Capture.name: Psionic Capture
Psionic Capture.flavor: You compel your foe to remain still as you probe its mind and erode its defenses.
Psionic Capture.onHit: 2d6 + ability modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. In addition, until the end of your next turn the target either loses one resistance of your choice or takes a -2 penalty to the defense of your choice.

Perfected Discipline.name: Perfected Discipline
Perfected Discipline.flavor: Using your knowledge of all types of psionic power, you attack your enemies’ minds and construct ethereal chains and enervating spikes.
Perfected Discipline.target: One, two, or three enemies in the burst
Perfected Discipline.attack: Primary ability vs. Fortitude, Reflex, and Will
Perfected Discipline.onHit (Will): The target takes ongoing 15 psychic damage (save ends).
Perfected Discipline.special: One saving throw ends all effects on a single target.

Mental Juxtaposition.name: Mental Juxtaposition
Mental Juxtaposition.flavor: By predicting your enemy’s next attack, you devise the perfect strategy to both avoid it and retaliate.
Mental Juxtaposition.trigger: An enemy in the burst hits an ally with an attack.
Mental Juxtaposition.effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to the attack roll and takes a -5 penalty to the defense the attack was made against until the end of its next turn.
